Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Benton
Chief of Police -- Town of Haughton
Alderman -- District  3, Town of Plain Dealing
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Bossier Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SummaryText:
Town of Haughton Proposition

Summary:  Authority for the Town of Haughton to issue not exceeding $3,300,000 of its Sewer Revenue Bonds (the "Bonds") to run not exceeding 22 years from the date thereof for the purpose of constructing and acquiring improvements and replacements to the sewerage system of the Town, including equipment and furnishings therefor, the Bonds to be payable solely from the income and revenues derived or to be derived from the operation of said revenue producing public utility.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Haughton, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), issue its Sewer Revenue Bonds (the "Bonds") in an amount not to exceed Three Million Three Hundred Thousand Dollars ($3,300,000) to run not exceeding twenty-two (22) years from the date thereof, with interest at a rate of not exceeding ninety-five hundredths of one percent (0.95%) per annum, for the purpose of constructing and acquiring improvements and replacements to the sewerage system of the Town, including equipment and furnishings therefor, said Bonds to be payable solely from the income and revenues derived or to be derived from the operation of said revenue producing utility, pursuant to the provisions of Part XIII, Chapter 4, Title 39 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950 and other constitutional and statutory authority?
